Function to recode sex variable

Source: R/03-recode_anthro.R
recode_sex.Rd

Function to recode sex variable

recode_sex(df)

Arguments

df

A data.frame collected for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Study containing anthropometric data

Value

A vector of recoded sex based on any re-testing done

Examples


recode_sex(df = childAnthro)
#>    [1]  2  1  2  2  2  1  2  2  1  2  1  2  2  1  1  1  2  1  2  1  1  2  1  2
